metadata.title: CVE-2022-3291 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Serialization of sensitive data in GitLab EE affecting all versions from14.9 prior to 15.2.5, 15.3 prior to 15.3.4, and 15.4 prior to 15.4.1 canleak sensitive information via cache

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
